1: Push blocks B1 and B2 to the right.
2: Move block B2 to the center of the arena.
3: Release block B1 and move away.
5: Move block B1 into special area SA3.
7: Push blocks B1, B2, and B5 upward toward special area SA2.
8: Move block B2 toward the top-right of the arena.
9: Move block B3 into special area SA1.
